dmca.title: Homesavers-mortgages complains of page copying
dmca.body:
Attn: Google Legal Support,
DMCA Complaints
(650) 963-3255,
Infringement Notification for Web Search
From
[private]
Email: [private]@gmail.com
 
My name [private]

My email address is [private]@gmail.com (Preferred)
Or [private]@homesavers-mortgages.co.uk (Second choice)

[private], Shildon, Co. Durham, England. DL4 2LZ

[private](My moble) [private](home) [private](work)[private](work fax)

My website is: www.homesavers-mortgages.co.uk

My website has been completely copied by: www.ueqfinance.co.uk Section 1 (See above for both websites)

My whole website has been copied, including mistakes in programming.

All they have done is added their name and animated Earth at the top and a small advertisement at the base of each page.

Section 2 : (See above for both websites)

Searching on www.google.co.uk and using Search Query: homesavers mortgages In 1st position mywebsite: www.homesavers-mortgages.co.uk

In 2nd position is the copied site:
Infringed Web Pages/Site: www.uegfinance.co.uk/UEG's%20bad-credit-mortgages.htm

In 3rd position is the copied site:
Infringed Web PageslSite: www.uegfinance.co.uk/UEG'S%20100%25%20mortgaaes.htm

Section 3 :
My email address is [private]@gmail.com

Section 4 :
I believe the person who copied my website is : [private]

Address/tel number (I think this is the best address)
[private], Ipswich, Suffolk IP3 9LU. GB : (01473) 422445

Another address that may be out of date;
[private] (Trading as: The United Earth Group)
3rd Floor, 133 Lincoln Road, Basildon, Essex, SS14 3RL, GB

I suspect his current email address is [private]@ntlworld.com.
 
Below are some email addresses with times when they were thought to be active.
[private]@ntlworld.com	(Feb 2005 - Aug 2005)
[private]@blueyonder.co.uk	(Dec 2003 - May 2004)
[private]@clara.net	(Jul 1999 - Aug 2000)

Section 5:
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Section 6 :
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Section 7 :

Signed:  J B	Date: 20.03.06
[private]


P.S.

I spent literary 100's of hours creating and checking then received advice on the legal side before putting it to the web.

Please can you sort this out by removing this website.

If you check out you will find they/he only started the site on 05 Feb 2006 My site was started 24-Sept 2004

If you require any further information I will only be to glad to help in any way I can. Hoping you can help.

Bryan
